signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR: [de Kooning 71]
text: One of the most important figures of Abstract Expressionism, De Kooning made prints only sporadically during his career. His most successful prints, including this masterful lithograph of 1971, are dynamic variants of action painting on stone.
title: Landscape at Stanton Street
